attributes.action: Declare the vote for London mayor as void due to mess up with voting registers.
attributes.background: In the voting for London mayor the registers were suspiciously messed with. They particularly made sure that the jewish community could not vote in the mayoral election. Therefore the result must be void and investigated for fraud.

rejection.details:
The running of elections is the responsibility of your local council, overseen by the Electoral Commission. You can find out how to make a complaint about the running of an election here:

http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/complaints
